=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Professional Grade Retinol Anti-Aging Skin Moisturizing Cream - For Age Spots - By Swiss Botany
Review Date: 2014/12/12
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.69 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '791154469675'}
Review Text: Great moisturizer!  This cream does indeed absorb into the skin.  It feels refreshing & it doesn't have a scent to me.  I've been using a lot of various serums & having an actual cream to use is a nice change!  The pump dispenses nicely & there's no waste.  Quite a lot of uses in the bottle.  I'll be using this for a quite a while-Thanks for a great product!

reference_summary:
Miracalis - Best Face Cream Moisturizer With Advanced Anti Aging Wrinkle Formula. Clinically Proven To Reduce Wrinkle Depth, Smooth Fine Lines & Soften Skin. Cruelty Free, Hypoallergenic
Miracalis
['* Face Moisturizer * Face Anti Aging * Deep Hydration Face Cream * Hydrating Anti Aging Moisturizer * Aging Cream * Hydration Cream For Face * Regenerating Day Cream * Face Moisturizing Cream * Facial Moisturizers Anti Aging * Anti Aging Facial Cream * Hydrating Moisturizer for Face * Deep Moisturizing Face Cream * Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Moisturizing Cream Anti Aging * Peptide Face Cream * Moisturizer Facial Cream * Deep Face Moisturizer * Hydrating Facial Moisturizer * Best Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Anti Aging Skin Care * Bare Mineral * Neck Moisturizer * Neck Cream * Skin Cream * Anti Aging Skin', 'Your Face Will Look Lovelier In Only 15 Days!', 'Reduces the depth of your facial wrinkles with daily use.', 'You will quickly look noticeably younger, healthier, and more attractive.', 'Simply apply Miracalis Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream right after washing your face in the morning and again at night.', 'What About My Skin Type?', 'A safe, gentle, hypoallergenic formula that is tested and recommended for all 4 major skin types: Normal, Sensitive, Dry or Oily Skin', 'Your Shield Against The Signs Of Aging', "Your skin is under daily attack - air pollution, the sun's harmful rays, germs and time itself all wear down your skin's natural barriers. The result is dry, cracked and tired looking skin.", 'Our formula restores the two natural antioxidants (Vitamin E and Co-Enzyme Q10) that your skin needs to properly repair and maintain this barrier.', 'Your skin will look younger, be less sensitive. "Great feeling cream! Cool going on. Liked the e-book on Anti-Aging tips. I'm working on my "marionette" aging lines starting to go down from my mouth. They actually look less noticeable. This may just be the cream to soften & MAYBE get rid of them! Keeping my fingers crossed-Thank you!"

Pink Hair Brush
THZY
['FLAT IRON']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 2.9 x 1.7 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'VZ-DETBR-PK', 'UPC': '609595109299', 'Manufacturer': 'THZY'}
Love this brush!  It really fits in your hand & feels so good on your scalp!  It does the job for detangling without ripping my hair out or breaking the ends off!  I laid the brush down & the next thing I knew, my cat was rubbing his chin on it!  A sure sign that it's a good brush!  I'm getting my granddaughter one because she uses a brush on her wet long hair.  She really needs to quit pulling & breaking her hair.  Thanks for a great product!
Love this brush

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interest**: Anti-aging skincare products focused on facial hydration and wrinkle reduction, with an increasing interest in hair care tools.
- **Key Attributes**: Prefers hypoallergenic, cruelty-free, and clinically proven products. Enjoys sensorial experiences in skincare and hair care.
- **Usage Pattern**: Applies face creams both morning and night for effectiveness and values ergonomic designs in hair tools for comfortable use.
- **Desired Outcomes**: Seeks visible improvements in skin appearance, such as reduced wrinkle depth and enhanced skin texture. Values quick results and formulations that restore the skin's natural defenses against aging, while aiming for effective hair detangling without damage.
- **User Experience**: Appreciates resources like anti-aging tips and enjoys gentle products for skin and hair. Engaged positively with moisturizing creams that absorb well and offer a refreshing feel.
- **Feedback & Engagement**: Actively provides feedback on product effectiveness, particularly regarding concerns like marionette lines and hair brushes. Recently expressed enthusiasm for moisturizers that deliver noticeable results, highlighting effective absorption and user-friendly designs.

Overall, the user is committed to anti-aging skincare and hair care tools, prioritizing hydration, efficacy, gentle formulations, ergonomic design, and ethical standards. The latest experience showcases an appreciation for moisturizing products that enhance both usability and effectiveness, reinforcing their focus on tangible results.
